pr_title: [RW-5902][risk=moderate] Create Fitbit flag part of CDR version metadata

timeline.message: Add Fitbit flag to CDR Metadata

timeline.bodyText: Not sure we need an enum.. you can just make the type: boolean
timeline.author: freemabd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3641,6 +3641,12 @@ definitions:
     - unregistered
     - registered
     - protected
+  CdrFitBitData:
+    type: string
+    description: Whether CDR has FITBIT data
+    enum:
+    - true
+    - false

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this just be type: boolean like hasMicroarrayData above
timeline.author: freemabd
freemabd

timeline.bodyText: If we use type boolean, there is not need for these mthods.
timeline.author: freemabd

timeline.message: Change hasFitbit from enum to boolean
